nodes.text: Prard'ras'kleoni, otherwise known by his core name of Drask, was a general in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet, who served as the military counterpart to Aristocra Chaf'orm'bintrano on the mission to repatriate the survivors of Outbound Flight in 22 ABY. Although initially cool to the Human delegates of the Empire of the Hand and the New Republic, Luke Skywalker, Mara Jade, and in particular Commander Chak Fel earned his respect as they fought together against the Vagaari.
Following the Battle of the Redoubt, he led the Chiss attack on the Vagaari.
